message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $11,500.  I believe it offers excellent value at this price point. What do you think?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I'm motivated to sell, $10,500 is a bit too low for me.  Could you consider $11,000? It's a fair offer considering the value this product brings.
Hi Alice, I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $10,500. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $10,750?
